name: Monsters in Space
description:
Sign up for a space marine, start colonizing the planet fighting hordes of monsters.

A game in the genre of build a defense in a kind of 2D styles. It is necessary to restrain waves of monsters by building turrets, upgrade them and do not forget to look into the research laboratory to improve the characteristics of the hero.

Management: depending on which device you are playing on.  1-keyboard, (W-A-D-E|arrows - move, CTR - shoot, Space - select what to build) 2 - mouse (left button - shoot, walk, right button - build) 3 - touch screen (move on the on-screen joystick, icons on the screen, construction and improvements).
